Subject: Automate the process of applying policies for users
Description:
I want to ask whether Endpoint Protector can automatically apply policies for users through syncing groups from Azure Active Directory. Currently, I am applying policies manually by adding each device/username to the policy. 
For example: if I add a user to the PII group in Azure Active Directory, Endpoint Protector will apply the corresponding policy through the sync between Azure AD and Endpoint Protector.
